function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated water sources provide breeding grounds for disease-carrying mosquitoes, increasing the risk of malaria and dengue transmission.","Impact":"Increased incidence of malaria and dengue fever, leading to higher morbidity and mortality rates in affected populations.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to improve water quality and sanitation, as well as mosquito control and elimination of breeding sites.","Technologies":"Water purification systems, sanitation infrastructure, mosquito nets, and insecticides.","People":"Residents of informal settlements and urban areas with poor water and sanitation conditions.","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Air pollution, including particulate matter and other pollutants, has been linked to increased severity and transmission of COVID-19.","Impact":"Higher incidence, severity, and mortality rates of COVID-19, as well as prolonged recovery periods.","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution through the use of clean energy, emission controls, and urban planning to minimize exposure to pollutants.","Technologies":"Renewable energy, emission control technologies, urban design for reduced pollution exposure.","People":"General population, particularly those living in areas with high levels of air pollution.","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental advocacy groups, and urban planners."}]}
